document: The assessment of behavior patterns, personality characteristics and theoretical orientations for Master's level counseling students by Ronald E. Hawkins Dissertation submitted to the Faculty of the Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of Doctor of Education in Counselor Education APPROVED: David E. Hutchins, Clinton Browne Chairman Hildy Getz Marilyn Lichtman Carl McDaniels May 1988 Blacksburg, Virginia
